        @Nonnull
public static <E> ObservableList<E> createJavaFXThreadProxyList(@Nonnull
                                                                         ObservableList<E> source)
        Wraps an ObservableList, publishing updates inside the UI thread.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the list's paramter type.
        Parameters:
        source - the ObservableList to be wrapped
        Returns:
        a new ObservableList
        Since:
